verses.verse: <WH5315>"'If anyone sins, <WH2398> in that he hears <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of adjuration, <WH423> he being a witness, <WH5707> whether <WH176> he has seen <WH7200> or known, <WH3045> if he doesn't <WH5046> report it, <WH5375> then he shall bear his iniquity. <WH5771>

<WH5315>"'Or if anyone touches <WH5060> any unclean <WH2931> thing, <WH1697> whether it is the carcass <WH5038> of an unclean <WH2931> animal, <WH2416> or the carcass <WH5038> of unclean <WH2931> livestock, <WH929> or the carcass <WH5038> of unclean <WH2931> creeping things, <WH8318> and it is hidden <WH5956> from him, <WH2931> and he is unclean, then he shall be guilty. <WH816>

<WH5060>"'Or if he touches the uncleanness <WH2932> of man, <WH120> whatever his uncleanness <WH2932> is with which he is unclean, <WH2930> and it is hidden <WH5956> from him; <WH3045> when he knows of it, <WH816> then he shall be guilty.

<WH5315>"'Or if anyone swears <WH7650> rashly <WH981> with his lips <WH8193> to do evil, <WH7489> or to do good, <WH3190> whatever it is that a man <WH120> might utter rashly <WH981> with an oath, <WH7621> and it is hidden <WH5956> from him; <WH3045> when he knows of it, <WH816> then he shall be guilty of one of these. <WH259>
It shall be, <WH816> when he is guilty of one <WH259> of these, <WH3034> he shall confess that in which he has sinned: <WH2398>

and he shall bring <WH935> his trespass offering <WH817> to Yahweh <WH3068> for his sin <WH2403> which he has sinned, <WH2398> a female <WH5347> from the flock, <WH6629> a lamb <WH3776> or a <WH8166> goat, <WH8166> for a sin offering; <WH2403> and the priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him concerning his sin. <WH2403>

<WH3027>"'If he can't <WH1767> afford a <WH5060> lamb, <WH7716> then he <WH3027> shall bring <WH5060> his trespass <WH817> offering for <WH854> that in which he has sinned, <WH8147> two turtledoves, <WH8449> or two <WH8147> young <WH1121> pigeons, <WH3123> to Yahweh; <WH3068> one <WH259> for a sin offering, <WH2403> and the other <WH259> for a burnt offering. <WH2403>

He shall bring <WH935> them to the priest, <WH3548> who shall first offer <WH7126> the one which is for the sin offering, <WH2403> and <WH7223> wring off <WH4454> its head <WH7218> from <WH4136> its neck, <WH6203> but shall not sever it completely. <WH914>

He shall sprinkle <WH5137> some of the blood <WH1818> of the sin offering <WH2403> on the side <WH7023> of the altar; <WH4196> and the rest <WH7604> of the blood <WH1818> shall be drained out <WH4680> at the base <WH3247> of the altar. <WH4196> It is a sin offering. <WH2403>

He shall offer <WH6213> the second <WH8145> for a burnt offering, <WH5930> according to the ordinance; <WH4941> and the priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him concerning his sin <WH2403> which he has sinned, <WH2398> and he shall be forgiven. <WH5545>

<WH3027>"'But if he can't <WH5381> afford two <WH8147> turtledoves, <WH8449> or two <WH8147> young <WH1121> pigeons, <WH3123> then he shall bring <WH935> his offering <WH7133> for that in which he has sinned, <WH2398> the tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374> of fine flour <WH5560> for a sin offering. <WH2403> He shall put <WH7760> no oil <WH8081> on it, <WH5414> neither shall he put any frankincense <WH3828> on it, <WH2403> for it is a sin offering.

He shall bring <WH935> it to the priest, <WH3548> and the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH7061> his handful <WH4393> of it as the memorial <WH234> portion, <WH6999> and burn it on the altar, <WH4196> on the offerings of Yahweh <WH3068> made by fire. <WH801> It is a sin offering. <WH2403>

The priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him concerning his sin <WH2403> that he has sinned <WH2398> in any <WH259> of these things, <WH5545> and he will be forgiven; and the rest shall be the priest <WH3548>'s, as the meal offering. <WH4503>'"

"If anyone <WH5315> commits <WH4603> a trespass, <WH4604> and sins <WH4604> unwittingly, <WH7684> in the holy things <WH6944> of Yahweh; <WH3068> then he shall bring <WH935> his trespass <WH817> offering to Yahweh, <WH3068> a ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549> from the flock, <WH6629> according to your estimation <WH6187> in silver <WH3701> by shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> for a trespass offering. <WH817>

He shall make restitution <WH7999> for that which he has done wrong <WH2398> in the holy thing, <WH6944> and shall add <WH3254> a fifth part <WH2549> to it, <WH5414> and give it to the priest; <WH3548> and the priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him with the ram <WH352> of the trespass offering, <WH817> and he will be forgiven. <WH5545>

"If anyone <WH5315> sins, <WH2398> and does <WH6213> any <WH259> of the things which Yahweh <WH3068> has commanded <WH4687> not to be done; <WH6213> though he didn't <WH3045> know it, <WH816> yet he is guilty, and shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity. <WH5771>

He shall bring <WH935> a ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549> from of the flock, <WH6629> according to your estimation, <WH6187> for a trespass offering, <WH817> to the priest; <WH3548> and the priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him concerning the thing <WH7684> in which he sinned <WH7683> and didn't <WH3045> know it, <WH5545> and he will be forgiven.
It is a trespass offering. <WH817> He is certainly <WH816> guilty <WH816> before Yahweh. <WH3068>"
